definition: floor consisting of open space at the top of a house just below roof, lay out a full-scale working drawing of the lines of a vessel's hull
details:
noun
- floor consisting of open space at the top of a house just below roof
= synonyms: attic
- a raised shelter in which pigeons are kept
= synonyms: pigeon loft
- floor consisting of a large unpartitioned space over a factory or warehouse or other commercial space
- (golf) the backward slant on the head of some golf clubs that is designed to drive the ball high in the air
verb
- lay out a full-scale working drawing of the lines of a vessel's hull
- kick or strike high in the air
= example: kick or strike high in the air
- propel through the air
= example: propel through the air
= synonyms: throw
- store in a loft
